short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Checklist to focus on everyday work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Checklistz is simple, free, and ad-free Chrome extension tool where you can manage your everyday tasks and focus on completing today's work.

You don't require any registration/login to use this app. Just install and start using the app.

The benefit of this extension over any other extension available in the market is that other apps require permission to read your data on all websites you visit. Still, this extension does not require any such access. 

This app uses a Chrome storage sync feature to store your data. 
If you log in to another system in the Chrome browser, your Checklistz data will be synched.

This tool can be used to:
1. Create a list of tasks focused on today.
2. Mark the task as checked or done by clicking on the list item.
3. Delete the task item by clicking on the close icon
4. Reorder them using the reorder icon

If you have any feedback, suggestions, or questions, please reach out to us at:
